vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in BANK_SAFE.collect (patch_8.sol#31-37):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_8.sol#33-36)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_8.sol#34)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: newMsg in LogFile.addMessage (patch_8.sol#55) is a local variable never initialiazed
